name: City Worker Delivery Service (Oil Leak Games)
name_original: City Worker Delivery Service (Oil Leak Games)
description:
The city is in disrepair and needs new workers. Stat! You’re tasked with getting the potential employees geared up and to their interview on time before the city falls apart!

City Worker Delivery Service is a game jam game made in 48 hours. The theme was “Fix public infrastructures with animals and objects found on the street.”

Directions:
A/D or Arrow keys: Steer the car
Hold Space(Driving): Have the passenger put their seat belt on.
Space (Dialog): Continue dialog

Credits:

Art by Rachelle Viola (dr!p)
